title: DNS Authoritative Servers Analysis
description: The metric M8 tracks the traffic at participatig resolvers by measuring three values: the fraction of queries that trigger an NX_DOMAIN responses (M8.1); the fraction of resolvers that use Extended DNS (EDNS) (M8.2.1); the frequency of usage by resolvers of EDNS Options (M8.2.2); the fraction of resolvers that set the DNSSEC OK flag (M8.3); and, the fraction of resolvers that use QName Minimization (M8.4).
